item.title: Get Started With Minikube on MacOS
item.description: What is Minikube? Minikube is a tool that makes it easy to run Kubernetes locally. It is a one node cluster, where the master and worker processes are on the same machine. Setup Minikube On MacOS To get started wiht minikube on macOS, we need to install binary for minikube which can be downloaded using the following command: <!-- For x64-86 --> curl -LO https://storage.googleapis.com/minikube/releases/latest/minikube-darwin-amd64 sudo install minikube-darwin-amd64 /usr/local/bin/minikube <!
